title: Physics simulation configuration file
description: Specifies the initial setup for the force fields, particles, and wires used by the physics simulation.

electric field.description: The constant electric field. Measured in N/C.

magnetic field.description: The constant magnetic field. Measured in teslas.

gravitational field.description: The constant gravitational field. Measured in N/kg.

particles.description: The point particles used in the simulation.

wires.description: The current-carrying wires used in the simulatoin.
